glsa.title: libgdata: Man-in-the-Middle attack
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in libgdata could allow remote attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks.

background.p: libgdata is a GLib-based library for accessing online service APIs using the GData protocol.

description.p: An error in the "_gdata_service_build_session()" function of gdata-service.c prevents libgdata from properly validating certificates.

impact.p: A remote attacker could perform man-in-the-middle attacks to spoof arbitrary SSL servers via a crafted certificate.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
